description: Acer pseudoplatanus (Sycamore) - LZ 03 - Social Club - LZ00617 - Unsuitable location - Coppice.Fraxinus excelsior (Common Ash) - LZ 03 - Social Club - LZ00618 - Unsuitable location - Coppice.Aesculus hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) - LZ 03 - Social Club - LZ00619 - Coppice.Ulmus sp (Elm) - LZ 04 - Cottons - LZ02828 - Unsuitable location - Coppice.Chamaecyparis lawsoniana (Lawson Cypress) - LZ 05 - Woodland Walk - LZ02213 - Fell to ground.Chamaecyparis lawsoniana (Lawson Cypress) - LZ 05 - Woodland Walk - LZ02214 - Fell to ground.Platanus x hispanica (London Plane) - LZ 18 - Lion Terraces - LZ02429 - Aerial inspection for Massaria - Remove affected branches where necessary.  Crown lift to 4.0m - Above walkway. Lift whole crown to this level to balance. Tip prune as specified - low limb from 8m west on west stem has bio mechanical symptom of currently arrested I beam fracture - shorten tips of noted limb by 2m only but also thin out 20% of branches at the end of ths whole limb.Platanus x hispanica (London Plane) - LZ 18 - Lion Terraces - LZ02430 - Aerial inspection for Massaria - Remove affected branches where necessary.
